mandatory_attributes.description: Defines the style of the shapewear. Examples include Waist Shaper, Arm Shaper, Hip & Butt Shaper, Tummy Shaper, Body Shaper, Thigh Shaper, Open Bust Shaper, Merry Widow, Half Slip.
Defines the type of shapewear item. Examples include Shapewear, Girdle, Corset, Half Slip, Waist Cincher, Singlet, Bustier, Saree, Long Leg.
Describes the level of support or control provided by an undergarment. Levels include Extra Firm, Firm, Light, Medium.
